common.comingSoonTitle: Zai iso nan ba da jimawa ba
common.comingSoonBody: Muna kammala wannan zaɓin. Don Allah ka dawo nan ba da jimawa ba.

dashboard.title: Garkuwar Phishing ta AI
dashboard.subtitle: Ga yadda kariyar wayarka take a yanzu.

statusCard.title: Kana cikin kariya
statusCard.description: Ganewar barazanar phishing na gudana a hankali a bayan fage.

hero.activeDescription: Ganewar barazanar phishing na gudana a hankali a bayan fage.
hero.pausedDescription: Ba da izinonin da suka rage domin ganowar phishing ta ci gaba da aiki.

stats.title: Kididdigar kariyarka

trend.flat: Babu canji idan aka kwatanta da baya

stats.comparison: idan aka kwatanta da lokacin baya

mockScan.title: Gudanar da binciken kwaikwayo
mockScan.subtitle: Jeka na’urar kwaikwayo domin tayar da ganowa ta misali.

stats.title: Kididdigar kariya
stats.subtitle: Duba yadda aka duba saƙonni da barazanar da aka toshe.

trusted.title: Masu aikowa amintattu
trusted.subtitle: Duba da sarrafa lambobin da ka ware a matsayin masu aminci.

model.title: Sabunta samfurin
model.subtitle: Duba sabbin nau’in na’urar gano barazana kuma sarrafa sigogin da aka saka.

developer.title: Kayan aikin masu haɓakawa
developer.subtitle: Sake saita koyarwar farko kuma sake duba izinoni.

activity.title: Aikin kwanan nan
activity.empty: Har yanzu babu ganowa. Gudanar da binciken kwaikwayo don ganin yadda gargadi zai fito.

recentAlerts.title: Gargadi na baya-bayan nan
recentAlerts.subtitle: Sabbin saƙonnin da garkuwa ta nuna akwai haɗari.
recentAlerts.empty: Babu gargadi a yanzu. Ka ci gaba da lura!
recentAlerts.emptyWithFilters: Ba a samu gargadin da ya dace da {{filters}} ba. Gwada sauya matattara.

trustedToggle.label: Nuna masu aiko da kake yarda da su kaɗai
trustedToggle.description: Takaita sakamakon zuwa masu aiko da ka sa a matsayin masu aminci a cikin Saituna.

feedback.title: Shin wannan gargaɗi ya dace?
feedback.subtitle: Faɗa mana ko harin phishing ne na gaske ko ƙararrawa ce ta ƙarya.

status.submitted: Mun gode da taimakonka wajen inganta garkuwan.
status.confirmed: An sanya shi a matsayin phishing
status.falsePositive: An sanya shi a matsayin lafiya

feedback.error: Ba mu iya aikawa da wannan ra'ayi ba. Ka sake gwadawa.

recentAlerts.searchPlaceholder: Nemo gargadi ta mai aikowa, abun ciki, ko alama
recentAlerts.trustedDefault: Ka saka wannan mai aiko cikin jerin masu aminci a Saituna.
recentAlerts.historyAlertTitle: Zai iso nan ba da jimawa ba
recentAlerts.historyAlertBody: Za ka iya duba cikakken tarihin gargadi a matakin gaba.

items.preview: Ka karɓi kuɗin haraji yanzu. Danna wannan mahaɗi…
Gaggawa: Tabbatar da bayanan biyan kuɗinka don kar a dakatar da kai.
Mun saka kuɗi a asusunka. Don Allah ka tabbatar nan da nan!

trustedSources.title: Masu aiko amintattu
trustedSources.subtitle: Sarrafa lambobin tuntuɓa da ka ware a matsayin masu aminci.
trustedSources.empty: Ba ka ƙara wani mai aiko amintacce ba tukuna.

report.title: Ba da rahoton saƙo
report.subtitle: Ba da daɗewa ba: raba saƙonnin da kake zargi ba tare da sunanka ba domin ƙarfafa samfurin.
report.cta: Zai iso nan ba da jimawa ba
report.modalSubtitle: Paste details of anything that looks risky. We'll sync it once you're back online.

placeholders.message: Paste or describe the suspicious message here...
placeholders.comment: Add context, e.g. why it looks risky.

status.heading: Report status
status.idle: Queued reports send automatically when a secure connection is available.
status.success: Report queued successfully. Thanks for training the shield!
status.error: We couldn't queue the report. Please try again.

validation.messageRequired: Add the suspicious message so we know what to review.

disabled.title: Manual reporting disabled
disabled.body: Turn on manual reports in Settings → Data & telemetry to send suspicious messages.

report.loadingBody: We're still loading your reporting preferences. Try again in a moment.

expoGoNotice.title: Takaitaccen Expo Go
expoGoNotice.body: Binciken baya yana tsaya wa a Expo Go. Gina app na ci gaba ko na kansa domin garkuwa ta cigaba da aiki ko da ka rufe app ɗin.

permissionsReminder.title: Kunna izinonin da ake buƙata
permissionsReminder.body: Kunna sanarwa da SMS domin garkuwa ta iya duba saƙonni ta atomatik.

messagesScanned.title: Yadda bincike ke aiki
messagesScanned.body: Ana nazarin saƙonni a kan na’urarka nan take bayan sun bayyana. Muna haɗa samfurin bayanai da gwaje-gwajen kwaikwayo domin nuna yadda garkuwa ke aiki koyaushe.

threatsBlocked.title: Game da barazanar da aka toshe
threatsBlocked.body: Garkuwa tana ɗaga duk abin da ya nuna haɗari, ko daga bayanan tarihi ko kuma gwaje-gwajenka. Yi amfani da wannan don kimanta yadda ake kama yunkurin phishing.

safeMessages.title: Fahimtar saƙonnin lafiya
safeMessages.body: Ƙididdigar lafiya na nuna yawan saƙonnin da suka wuce tantancewa. Muna cire abin da ake zargi daga jimillar da aka duba don nuna tsabtar akwatin saƙonninka.

mockDetection.title: Gudanar da gwajin kwaikwayo
mockDetection.subtitle: kunna na’urar gano barazana da saƙonnin kwaikwayo don ganin yadda gargadi ke bayyana.
mockDetection.helper: Idan an gano barazana, za a nuna bayanai a nan sannan ka karɓi sanarwa a wayarka.
mockDetection.successBody: Duba ɓangaren sanarwa domin ganin yadda zai bayyana a zahiri.
mockDetection.noThreatBody: Dukkan saƙonnin kwaikwayo sun kasance lafiya wannan karon. Gwada kuma daga baya!
mockDetection.errorBody: Ba mu iya gudanar da na’urar gano barazana yanzu ba. Rufe app ɗin ka sake budewa sannan kuma ka gwada.
mockDetection.noResultPlaceholder: Gudanar da kwaikwayo don ganin ainihin yadda gargadi zai bayyana a cikin app ɗin.
mockDetection.noMatches: Ba a dace da wani tsari na phishing ba, amma saƙon har yanzu yana nuna haɗari.
mockDetection.safePreviewSubtitle: Ga yadda na’urar bincike ke kallon saƙo mai kama da na gaskiya.
mockDetection.safeSampleUnavailableBody: Ba mu samu saƙon da haɗarinsa ya yi ƙasa a yanzu ba. Gwada gudanar da wani kwaikwayo.
mockDetection.clearedBody: An sake saita katin gano kwaikwayo.

onboarding.title: Kunshi Garkuwar Phishing ta AI
onboarding.subtitle: Bi waɗannan matakai ka fahimci abin da app ɗin ke yi da dalilin da yasa ake buƙatar izinoni.

skipDialog.title: Kana son tsallake izinonin da ake buƙata?
skipDialog.body: Ba tare da sanarwa da SMS ba, garkuwa ba za ta iya lura da zamba ta atomatik ba. Za ka iya kunna su daga baya a Saituna.

onboarding.permissionNoteBody: Da zarar wannan gajeren jagora ya ƙare za ka ba da damar sanarwa da SMS.
onboarding.permissionStepsTitle: Za ka ba da izini ga:

permissions.title: Ka bar garkuwa tana aiki
permissions.subtitle: kunna waɗannan izinonin domin mu binciki saƙonni da zarar sun iso.

notifications.title: Izinin sanarwa
notifications.description: Bar mu mu duba WhatsApp, Messenger, Gmail da sauran su a take.

sms.title: Izinin SMS
sms.description: Bar mu mu karanta SMS da ke shigowa domin gano abin da ake zargi nan da nan.
sms.unavailable: Izinin SMS ba dole ba ne a wannan na’ura.

permissions.continueHelper: kunna abin da ake buƙata kafin ka ci gaba
permissions.incompleteBody: kunna sanarwa da SMS domin garkuwa ta yi aiki ta atomatik.

slides.title: Kasance gaba da masu zamba
slides.description: Muna tantance SMS da sanarwa da zarar sun shigo wayarka domin gano masu zamba nan take.

slides.title: Sirrin ka muhimmi ne
slides.description: Duk bincike yana faruwa ne a kan na’urarka. Ba ma turawa ko ajiye bayananka a girgije.

slides.title: Ba mu izinonin da suka dace
slides.description: Za mu roƙi sanarwa da SMS domin mu ci gaba da lura a bayan gida ba tare da hayaniya ba.

permissions.title: Izinin sanarwa
permissions.description: Domin mu duba WhatsApp, Messenger, Gmail da sauransu nan take.

permissions.title: Izinin karanta SMS
permissions.description: Ana buƙatar shi don tantance saƙonnin da ake zargi da zarar sun iso.

settings.title: Saituna
settings.subtitle: Sarrafa harshe, sanarwa, da bincike. Wannan allon na wucin gadi ne har sai mun gama saituna na gaskiya.

diagnostics.loading: Ana tattara bayanan bincike ba tare da sunaye ba...
diagnostics.errorBody: Mun sami matsala wajen ƙirƙirar hoton nan take. Sake gwadawa da kyakkyawan haɗi.
diagnostics.shareErrorBody: Ba mu iya raba hoton bincike ba. Don Allah a sake gwadawa.
diagnostics.disclaimer: Wannan fitarwa ba ya ɗauke da bayanan sirri. Raba shi da ma’aikatan tallafin da kake yarda da su kaɗai.

theme.title: Tsarin kallo
theme.description: Zaɓi yadda app ɗin zai bayyana.

telemetry.title: Raba barazana
telemetry.description: Ka sarrafa yadda ake raba faɗakarwa da rahotanni da AI Phishing Shield domin inganta samfurin.
telemetry.autoUploadSubtitle: Raba bayanan faɗakarwa ba tare da sunan mai amfani ba idan aka gano abin zargi.
telemetry.manualReportsTitle: Ba da damar rahoto da hannu
telemetry.manualReportsSubtitle: Kasance da damar aikewa da rahoto daga dashboard idan ka lura da saƙo mai zargi.
telemetry.errorBody: Ba mu iya ajiye zabin ka ba. Da fatan ka sake gwadawa.

model.title: Sabunta samfurin
model.description: Saka sabbin samfuran gano phishing kuma sarrafa sigogi.

language.title: Harshe
language.description: Sauya tsakanin Turanci, Faransanci, Swahili, Yarbanci, Igbo, Hausa, Pijin, Larabci, da Amharic.

deviceDefault.title: Bi harshen na’urar
deviceDefault.description: A bar app ɗin ya yi daidai da harshen wayarka.

notifications.title: Sanarwa
notifications.description: Saita sautin gargadi, jijjiga, da lokutan shiru.
notifications.errorBody: We couldn't save these notification settings. Please try again.
notifications.permissionGranted: Notifications are enabled at the system level.
notifications.permissionMissing: Turn on notification access to let the shield alert you instantly.

masterToggle.title: Alerts
masterToggle.description: Turn phishing alerts on or off for this device.

sound.title: Play sound
sound.description: Play a tone when a phishing alert is detected.

vibration.title: Vibrate on alert
vibration.description: Trigger vibration feedback when alerts fire.

quietHours.title: Quiet hours
quietHours.helper: Tap to rotate through preset quiet-hour windows.

trustedSources.title: Masu aiko amintattu
trustedSources.description: Sarrafa lambobin waya ko masu aiko da imel da kake ganin sun dace.
trustedSources.emptyState: Har yanzu babu wanda ka ƙara. Ƙara layukan banki, ma’aikatan HR, ko abokan harka da kake yarda da su.
trustedSources.removeTitle: A cire wannan mai aikowa amintacce?
trustedSources.validationTitle: Ba a samu mai aikowa ba
trustedSources.validationHandle: Shigar da sunan ko lambar da kake son ka yarda da shi daidai
trustedSources.duplicateBody: An riga an yi alamar wannan mai aiko a matsayin amintacce ga wannan tashar.
trustedSources.errorBody: Ba mu iya sabunta jerin masu aiko amintattunka ba. Don Allah ka sake gwadawa.
trustedSources.modalSubtitle: Rubuta tuntuɓa na hukuma domin gargadi su ci gaba da zama masu ma’ana.

diagnostics.title: Bincike
diagnostics.description: Aika bayanai ba tare da suna ba domin taimaka wa ingancin ganowa.

model.title: Gudanar da samfurin
model.subtitle: Sauke sabuntawa, kunna sigogi, kuma duba tarihin sakawa.
model.availableEmpty: Kana amfani da sabuwar sigar yanzu.
model.installedEmpty: Babu samfurin da aka saka tukuna.
model.offlineFallbackBanner: Couldn't reach the live registry. Showing the built-in demo catalog for now.

catalogMode.description: Switch between live registry updates and the offline demo catalog. Live mode downloads real model files.

details.currentStatusActive: This model is currently powering phishing detection.
details.noActive: No model is active yet. Install and activate a version to start scanning.

alerts.installSuccessBody: Sigar {{version}} yanzu tana aiki a kan na'urarka.
alerts.installErrorBody: Ba mu iya ƙara sigar {{version}} ba. Da fatan za ka sake gwadawa.
alerts.activateSuccessBody: Sigar {{version}} ita ce mai gano barazana yanzu.
alerts.activateErrorBody: Ba mu iya sauya samfurin ba. Da fatan za ka gwada kuma.
alerts.removeConfirmBody: Cire sigar {{version}} yana sake sarari. Za ka iya sake sakawa daga baya idan kana buƙata.
alerts.removeErrorBody: Ba mu iya cire sigar {{version}} ba. Gwada bayan ka daidaita.
alerts.syncErrorBody: Ba mu iya sabunta katalog ba. Duba haɗinka ka gwada kuma.

resetOnboarding.title: Sake saita tsarin koyarwa
resetOnboarding.successBody: Mun share matsayin koyarwar farko. Bude app ɗin domin fara darasin daga farko.
resetOnboarding.errorBody: Ba mu iya share matsayin koyarwar farko ba. Don Allah ka sake gwadawa.
